Kueh/DT Tutu/NN 's/POS history/NN stretches/NN back/RB to/TO the/DT 1930/NN 's/POS when/WRB it/PRP was/VBD first/JJ popularized/VBD by/IN Tan/NN Yong/NN Fa/NN ,/, a/DT man/NN who/WP arrived/VBD in/IN Singapore/NNP from/IN Fujian/NNP ./. If/IN you/PRP have/VBP ever/RB eaten/VBN Kueh/JJ Tutu/NN and/CC went/VBD away/RB thinking/VBG that/WDT it/PRP was/VBD dry/JJ and/CC floury/JJ ,/, that/WDT is/VBZ because/IN it/PRP was/VBD made/VBD from/IN commercially/NNP sourced/NNP rice/NN flour/NN ./. This/DT machine/NN is/VBZ like/IN a/DT huge/NN ,/, crucible/NN which/WRB pounds/VBZ whole/JJ grain/NN Thai/NN Jasmine/NN rice/NN into/IN a/DT coarse/JJ flour/NN which/WDT is/VBZ then/RB sieved/JJ and/CC made/VBD into/IN Kueh/NN Tutu/NN ./. The/DT peanuts/NNS are/VBP also/RB similar/JJ roasted/NN ,/, ground/NN and/CC pounded/NN by/IN the/DT machine/NN ./.
